column5: Hey, I was just wondering if anyone knows the ice conditions on LOTW on the nestor falls end. Any help would be apreciated. thanks guys

Not enough yet, I spoke with our local plow master yesterday and the manitou has about 4 inches and was blown clean of snow this past weekend. He took his sled all the way from Kenora to twelve mile on sunday. He said there were spots on the back side of some islands with only two inches. Expect really safe ice around christmas to be safe he told me.
thanks, ill have to skip over there in a few days and checker.
was just out on the Basil channel, and we had an average of 8"...
